DAILY ANALYSIS #2: CODE BUG FOUND — DIP_BUY uses abs(price_change) as Kelly expected_return. If price dropped 5%, Kelly calculates as if 5% guaranteed return. This inflates position sizes on penny stocks, causing outsized losses.
